tags: None
review: Doctor was friendly and was not judgemental, asked good number of question and analysed me well and prescribed accordingly.

tags: None
review: First of all, I want to share my experience with the Dr. Karunya. Shes very calm and composed in her action. *** ********* ***** *** ***** ** **** **** ** ***** *** ** ***** *** ********** *During my visit ,my wife tends to ask so many questions and she kept answering all her doubts until she was clear. Secondly the staff at Helios hospital and the entire team made sure everything is done on time and the consultation is quick enough. Medicines are given instantaneously without any waiting time . Well organised management ! I would highly recommend Dr. Karunya to everyone looking up for having a healthy pregnancy.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Karunya was my doctor during my pregnancy and she also delivered my baby. Throughout my pregnancy she always listened and was very caring, she made me feel very confident. Also while giving medicines she use to explain, why we are taking that particular medicine. It was wonderful to have full trust in someone during such an important phase of my life. She was more like a family member then a doctor. Highly recommended. 
Thank you doctor

tags: None
review: *** ******* ** ** ********* ******* My entire experience through my 9 months of pregnancy with her has been amazing. She was always available whenever we needed her. She will give a lot of time to her patients and takes a lot of effort to put your mind at rest when it comes to all pregnancy related questions which is very essential especially for First Time Moms. Would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Karunya is one of the best persons I have ever met. She is one of the kindest doctors i have ever met , non judgmental calm and composed. She creates this aura of wellness and you feel your worries disappear. She allows you to contact her personally for any issues which is quite rare. She doesn’t charge you unnecessarily .She discusses all the options and tells us the best possible treatment choice. I am grateful to have found such a wonderful obstetrician and gynaecologist. She is so amazing at what she does!!! She is an angel! Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: Took my wife for treatment. The doctor was very patient and friendly. The clinic is located in a good location that had good access.  The clinic ambience was excellent and the staff were knowledgeable and welcoming. The doctor works on appointments and hence there was very little waiting time. Would highly recommend the doctor for gynae problems.
